text: On 7 September 2023, at least 49 civilians and 15 soldiers were killed when a group of Islamic people attacked a military camp and boat in Mali. The group attacked the boat as it was going from the town of Gao to Mopti. They also attacked an army camp in the Bourem Cercle in the Gao Region. A group linked to al-Qaeda said that they are the group that attacked the camp and boat. ==References== Category:September 2023 events Category:2023 in Africa Category:2020s in Mali Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in Africa Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in the 2020s
title: September 2023 Mali attacks
